description: Harriets of Hove is an eco supermarket located in Brighton, focusing on sustainable products. It operates as a refillable grocery store, allowing customers to bring their own containers to purchase various pantry items in bulk. Founded six years ago, the initiative aims to reduce plastic waste and promote sustainable consumption. Harriets of Hove partners with local businesses, in this organic-based store. Recently, it has evolved into a sustainability hub, expanding services to include B2B offerings and community events.
name: Harriets of Hove
